title: Blood & Gore Sound Pack
description: Elevate horror and combat experiences with the 'Blood & Gore Sound Pack.' With 510 distinct effects, including bone breaks, spills, and unsettling variations, this pack intensifies realism.
longDescription:
🔈View Sound List

🔈View Video Demo

Introducing the "Blood & Gore Sound Pack," a comprehensive collection of 510 diverse sound effects meticulously crafted to amplify the visceral and chilling aspects of your game.

This pack features an extensive array of blood-soaked and gory sound effects, including squeezes, impactful hits, bone-crushing sounds, visceral gore, spills, bone breaks, organ squelches, and more. The variations include unsettling twists like intestine sounds, body part impacts, stabbing effects, and a host of others. Moreover, the pack includes a range of slime and blade scrape sounds, each with multiple variations.

Specifically tailored for horror games, this pack offers the potential to infuse an extra layer of tension and unease into your gaming experience. Whether you're creating intense combat scenarios or aiming to evoke spine-chilling moments, the pack equips you with a diverse array of options to heighten your game's audio impact.

The "Blood & Gore Sound Pack" stands as an indispensable toolkit for game developers seeking to immerse players into the visceral dimensions of their projects. These meticulously crafted sound effects will help you craft an atmosphere that resonates with fear, suspense, and realism.

Don't miss out on the opportunity to elevate your game's intensity. Delve into the world of gruesome realism and captivate players with the evocative power of the "Blood & Gore Sound Pack."
technicalDetails:
Audio file types: Wav

Sample rate: 44,100Hz Sample Rate

Bit depth: 320Kbps Bit rate

Number of Audio Waves: 510

Number of Audio Cues: 510

Additional: Stereo

Do Sound Fx Loop: Yes

Windows and Mac: Yes

Support Dev Platform: Yes

-Dynamic sound

-Well organized
